experience: You and Matthew both know Lauretta (Laurie) Zerga, Peter Reno, and 103 others
You both worked at Charles Schwab
Matthew worked at Charles Schwab before you started

Under direction of the Deputy CIO for Operations, responsible for the managerial leadership of work teams responsible for the development and delivery of campus-wide Enterprise applications and web services. This position is primarily focused on leading coordination among the work teams toward increased service levels, operational efficiencies, and effective integration of software platforms and applications, and champion key initiatives that enable transformative IT services that deliver value to campus stakeholders. Passion for the University's mission of research, education and outreach.Initiatives include migration to a new system-wide HR/Payroll system, defining and developing the enterprise data management plans and architecture, directing the implementation and automation of a redesigned campus data architecture, migration of legacy Enterprise applications to a new Cloud-based service model, and supporting the enhancement of operational processes to enable systems monitoring, metrics tracking, and service excellence. Playing an active lead role in the development of functional and technical requirements, designing, prototyping and documenting applications services for web services, administrative applications, workflow and document imaging, and applications that leverage the campus Student Information Systems. Based on a multi-year application roadmap, lead migrations from legacy applications and build a modernized, standards-based enterprise service platform that supports the integration of a cloud-based application architecture with on premise-based solutions.

• Develops, integrates and installs financial products and features for retail and investment advisors on company’s website, including: online account opening, login, security, capturing prospect and client lead data, business process management and electronic signatures.• Implemented enhanced online account open for schwab.com that received a top rating among several financial service firms by outside evaluation firm that measures company’s products against other financial services firms.• Oversaw the execution of lead management system that has generated $100 million in new assets.• Identified unnecessary systems and applications using agile methodology saving the company $1,000,000.• Executed single sign-on capability so companies could seamlessly access online financial products and services.

• Ensured availability, capacity and performance per service level agreements of systems for schwab.com and advisorcenter.com.• Interviewed and hired staff; utilized offshore resources as needed.• Oversaw team of 20; performed annual reviews and worked individually with team members on setting goals and professional development; developed recognition program to keep staff engaged and productive.• Directed and oversaw system monitoring and alerting via dashboards.• Managed production operations model both onshore and offshore.

• Deployed new .NET website, schwab.com; developed deployment plan for launch including criteria matrix used throughout implementation phase; set-up geo-located commander posts during first week of launch; oversaw implementation of website infrastructure.• Acquired and coordinated integration of web, database and session management servers.• Designed online problem management tool to communicate issue resolution.
Managing Director – Schwab Workflow & Imaging System

• Led team of 45 cross-organizational technicians from application developers to system engineers in development, deployment, maintenance and support of enterprise-wide workflow and imaging system in support of Schwab operation.• Saved the company $6 million annually by identifying risks and strategically allocating resources.• Negotiated software contracts with IBM, FileNet and Kofax.
Service Oriented Architecture Special Interest Group

summary: I am a passionate, knowledgeable Senior Leader with extensive experience managing large scale IT projects and developing complicated infrastructure. I am known for my follow-through and commitment to excellence on every project as well as being a focused manager willing to provide the tools and support needed for teams to succeed and meet business objectives. I am comfortable communicating with all organizational levels due to my excellent written and oral communication skills. I thrive in high pressure environments and am efficient in managing multiple projects simultaneously utilizing my organization and prioritization skills. Leveraging my analytical skills, I am able to identify root causes, analyze symptoms and find effective solutions.
